Altar.description: Offer a Slab depicting a Pal to summon a powerful Pal to your base. Adequate caution and battle readiness is paramount.

Andon.description: Decorative Paper Lantern. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.

BaseCampBattleDirector.description: Bell that sets the alert status for Pals on base. Change Pal behavior to either attack invading enemies, or focus entirely on work whenever you like.

BaseCampItemDispenser.description: A device that lets you freely access items from all chests in the base.

BaseCampWorkHard.description: Command your Pals to work on various things inside a base. You can allow or prohibit individual kinds of work.

BlastFurnace.description: Allows refinement of Ingot. The quality leaves much to desire, and processing is slow. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

BlastFurnace2.description: Allows refinement of Refined Ingot. The quality has improved, but the processing speed is still unsatisfactory. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

BlastFurnace3.description: Allows refinement of Pal Metal Ingot. It requires electricity to use, but is quicker to process. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

BlastFurnace4.description: Allows refinement of Hexolite. By growing in size, multiple Pals can collaborate to perform smelting. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

Bonsai.description: Decorative Bonsai. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.

Box02_Iron.description: Cloth covered container for storing items.

BreedFarm.description: Assign one male and one female Pal to produce eggs. Placing Cake in the facility is required for production.

BuildableGoddessStatue.description: Stone statue spoken of in legends on Palpagos Island. Offer up Lifmunk Effigy to receive strange powers.

Byobu.description: Decorative folding screen. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.

CampFire.description: Needed for cooking food. It can only be used to grill simple ingredients. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

Cauldron.description: Place in base to improve medicine manufacturing speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

CeilingLamp.description: A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night. It can be placed on a ceiling. Requires electricity, but lights up a larger area.

CharacterRankUp.description: A chamber for increasing a Pal's rank. Pals can surpass their physical limitations if given a concentrated extract taken from a Pal of the same type.

Clock01_Stone.description: Decorative antique grandfather clock. Broken, it doesn't tell time.

Clock01_Wall_Iron.description: Decorative wall clock. Broken, it doesn't tell time.

CoalPit.description: Facility for producing Coal. Digging Coal is grueling physical work. Leave it to a Pal that is good at mining.

CompositeDesk.description: A facility that lets you combine multiple schematics to create more advanced ones.

Container01_Iron.description: Large container for storing items. Imitates the designs left behind by an ancient and prosperous civilization.

CookingStove.description: Needed for cooking food. Use of a cooking pot allows for a wider variety of meal preparation. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

Cooler.description: A device that blows cool air, lowering the temperature of a base. It doesn't provide much relief from the heat, but helps one to endure somewhat hot environments. Requires an Ice Pal for cooling.

CoolerBox.description: Small food vault. Assign an Ice Pal to help prevent food stored inside from spoiling.

CoolerPalFoodBox.description: A feeding box that can be kept cold. Assign an Ice Pal to it and the food inside will be less likely to spoil.

CopperPit.description: Facility for producing Ore. Mining Ore is hard work that requires physical endurance. Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

CopperPit_2.description: Facility for producing large quantities of Ore. Mining Ore is hard work that requires physical endurance. Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

Crusher.description: Facility for breaking down Stone and Wood to exchange them for other materials. Requires Pal with the Watering trait to spin the water turbine.

Curtain01_Wall_Stone.description: Decorative antique curtain. Can be placed on walls.

DamagedScarecrow.description: Training dummy shaped like a Pengullet. Can only be placed in wide open areas.

DefenseBowGun.description: Deploy a Pal to operate this defensive installation. Requires Arrow to use. Place ammo in the chest, and the deployed Pal will automatically load the weapon.

DefenseMachinegun.description: Deploy a Pal to operate this defensive installation. Requires Rifle Ammo to use. Place ammo in the chest, and the deployed Pal will automatically load the weapon.

DefenseMissile.description: Deploy a Pal to operate this defensive installation. Requires Rocket Ammo to use. Place ammo in the chest, and the deployed Pal will automatically load the weapon.

DefenseWait.description: Defensive installation to protect a base from enemies. Place a Pal and it will ignore other work to stay on lookout and prepare for combat.

DefenseWall.description: Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions. Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

DefenseWall_Metal.description: Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

DefenseWall_Wood.description: Massive defensive wall to prevent enemy intrusions. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

DimensionPalStorage.description: A facility for storing a large number of captured Pals. Any guild member can deposit or withdraw Pals. If you set it to private, it can serve as your personal Pal storage.

DismantlingConveyor.description: A dream-like facility that automatically butchers any Pal that is placed inside.

DisplayCharacter.description: Container for observing captured Pals. Pals inside cannot participate in battle or production, but they do not become hungry.

ElectricCooler.description: A device that blows cool air, lowering the temperature of a base. Using electricity, it can really lower the temperature. Requires an Ice Pal for cooling.

ElectricGenerator.description: A power generator fueled by Electric Pals. Electric equipment won't run without this.

ElectricGenerator_Large.description: A power generator fueled by Electric Pals. Larger and with improved power generation efficiency.

ElectricHatchingPalEgg.description: Device for incubating Pal eggs. Requires electricity, but automatically keeps the inside of the incubator at appropriate temperatures.

ElectricHeater.description: A device that blows warm air, raising the temperature of a base. Using electricity, it can really heat things up. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

ElectricKitchen.description: Needed for cooking food. It requires electricity to run, but allows a large amount of meals to be prepared rapidly. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

EnergyStorage_Electric.description: A facility for storing excess electricity generated by the Power Generator.

Expedition.description: A facility that allows Pals to be sent on expeditions to places like dungeons. The dispatched Pals engage in battles and gather items, bringing back resources to the base.

Factory_Hard_01.description: An Assembly Line for producing items and gear. A small workspace limits production speeds. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

Factory_Hard_02.description: An Assembly Line for producing items and gear. By splitting Pals into groups, production speeds have somewhat increased. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

Factory_Hard_03.description: An Assembly Line for producing items and gear. Through clever management, production speeds have greatly increased. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

Factory_Money.description: An Assemby Line that manufactures Money. The work puts a strain on the mind, causing a decrease in Pal's SAN value. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

FarmBlockV2_Berries.description: A farm that can grow Red Berries. Harvest time is quick, but eating them doesn't provide much sustenance. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

FarmBlockV2_Carrot.description: A farm where you can grow Carrot. It takes time to harvest, but increases the variety of meals you can prepare. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

FarmBlockV2_Lettuce.description: A farm that can grow Lettuce. It takes time to harvest, but increases the variety of meals you can prepare. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

FarmBlockV2_Onion.description: A farm where you can grow Onion. It takes time to harvest, but increases the variety of meals you can prepare. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

FarmBlockV2_Potato.description: A farm where you can grow Potato. It takes time to harvest, but increases the variety of meals you can prepare. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

FarmBlockV2_tomato.description: A farm that can grow Tomato. They take time to harvest, but increase the variety of meals you can prepare. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest the crops.

FarmBlockV2_wheet.description: A farm that can grow Wheat. It requires an average amount of time to harvest. Requires a few Pals to plant seeds, water, and harvest crops.

Farm_SkillFruits.description: A farm where Skillfruits can be cultivated. By planting the original fruit in the ground, multiple fruits of the same type can be harvested.

FastTravelPoint.description: A stone monument in the shape of a Chikipi. Allows fast travel to the location where it is placed.

FlourMill.description: Facility for milling Wheat to produce Flour. Requires Pal with the Watering trait to spin the water turbine.

FlowerBed.description: Place in base to improve gathering speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Fountain.description: Place in base to improve watering speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Fudukue.description: Decorative Ornamental Writing Table. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.

Glass_DoorWall.description: Door built on a foundation. Becomes an entrance. Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_SlantedRoof.description: Slanted roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind. Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_TriangleWall.description: Triangular wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders. Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_WindowWall.description: Wall with windows, built on foundations for keeping out intruders. Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_foundation.description: A foundation for building walls or facilities on. Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_roof.description: A roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind. Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_stair.description: Stairs placed below a foundation or roof for climbing up. Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

Glass_wall.description: Walls built on foundations for keeping out intruders. Made of industrial-strength glass, it's quite sturdy.

GlobalPalStorage.description: A facility that can store the genetic data of Pals and allows you to reconstruct them from this data. The stored genetic data can also be transferred to other worlds.

GoalSoccer_Iron.description: Decorative soccer goal. Kicking a SheepBall into it will get you no points.

GuildChest.description: A chest that can instantly send and receive items through subspace. The items inside are shared across all bases where it is placed.

HatchingPalEgg.description: Used for incubating a Pal Egg. If a Pal Egg is left in it, it will automatically hatch after some time has passed.

Headstone.description: A gravestone that can be inscribed with text. Use it for recording purposes.

Heater.description: A device that blows warm air, raising the temperature of a base. It doesn't provide much warmth, but helps one to endure somewhat cold environments. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

HugeKitchen.description: Needed for cooking food. By becoming larger, multiple Pals can cooperate to cook together. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

IceCrusher.description: Facility that crushes Ore and converts it into other materials. Requires a power supply and a Pal with Cooling suitability, but it's very efficient.

Irori.description: Decorative Hearth. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.

ItemBooth.description: A facility for selling items. By setting products in the sales list, you can sell items to other players. Assign an Ice Pal to it and the food inside will be less likely to spoil.

ItemChest.description: Stores items. Made from wood, it breaks easily. It's probably not the best thing to store valuables in.

ItemChest_02.description: Stores items. Reinforced with metal, it is somewhat durable. The increased size allows for the storage of more things.

ItemChest_03.description: Stores items. Made of iron, it is extremely durable. It is useful as a large, secure storage box.

ItemChest_04.description: Stores items. Quite sturdy, with plenty of storage space. It is useful as a large, secure storage box.

Ivy01.description: Decorative large ivy. Can be placed on a wall.

Ivy02.description: Decorative small ivy. Can be placed on a wall.

Ivy03.description: Decorative horizontal ivy. Can be placed on a wall.

JapaneseStyle_DoorWall_01.description: Door built on a foundation. Becomes an entrance. You can create stylish Japanese-style architecture.

JapaneseStyle_DoorWall_02.description: Japanese sliding door (shoji) built on a foundation. Becomes an indoor entrance. You can create stylish Japanese-style architecture.

JapaneseStyle_DoorWall_03.description: Japanese sliding door (fusuma) built on a foundation. Becomes an indoor entrance. You can create stylish Japanese-style architecture.

JapaneseStyle_Pillar.description: Column for structural support. You can create stylish Japanese-style architecture.

JapaneseStyle_SlantedRoof.description: Slanted roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind. You can create stylish Japanese-style architecture.

JapaneseStyle_TriangleWall.description: Triangular wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders. You can create stylish Japanese-style architecture.

JapaneseStyle_WindowWall.description: Wall with windows, built on foundations for keeping out intruders. You can create stylish Japanese-style architecture.

JapaneseStyle_foundation.description: A foundation for building walls or facilities on. You can create stylish Japanese-style architecture.

JapaneseStyle_roof_01.description: A roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind. You can create stylish Japanese-style architecture.

JapaneseStyle_roof_02.description: A roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind. You can create stylish Japanese-style architecture.

JapaneseStyle_stair.description: Stairs placed below a foundation or roof for climbing up. You can create stylish Japanese-style architecture.

JapaneseStyle_wall_01.description: Walls built on foundations for keeping out intruders. You can create stylish Japanese-style architecture.

Kakejiku.description: Decorative hanging scroll. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.

Koro.description: Decorative Incense Burner. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.

Lab.description: A facility for conducting research on the various tasks of Pals. By assigning tasks to Pals in this facility, research progresses, granting various benefits.

Lamp.description: A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night. Requires electricity, but lights up a larger area.

LargeCeilingLamp.description: A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night. It can be placed on a ceiling. Requires a significant amount of electricity, but lights up an even larger area.

LargeLamp.description: A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night. Requires a significant amount of electricity, but lights up an even larger area.

Light_CandleSticks_Top.description: Chandelier that provides illumination. Requires electricity to light.

Light_CandleSticks_Wall.description: Wall lamp that provides illumination. Requires electricity to light.

Light_FirePlace01.description: Brick fireplace that provides illumination. Must be lit with fire from a Fire Pal.

Light_FirePlace02.description: Fireplace that provides illumination. Must be lit with fire from a Fire Pal.

Light_FloorLamp01.description: Antique brown floor lamp that provides illumination. Requires electricity to light.

Light_FloorLamp02.description: Antique red floor lamp that provides illumination. Requires electricity to light.

Light_LightPole01.description: Simple street lamp that provides illumination. Requires electricity to light.

Light_LightPole02.description: Double street lamp that provides illumination. Requires electricity to light.

Light_LightPole03.description: Retro street lamp that provides illumination. Requires electricity to light.

Light_LightPole04.description: Stylish street lamp that provides illumination. Requires electricity to light.

MachineGame01_Iron.description: Decorative claw crane. Broken, it can't be played.

MachineVending01_Iron.description: Decorative cola vending machine. Cannot be used to buy items.

ManualElectricGenerator.description: A facility that converts rotational motion into electrical energy. The efficiency is low, and the Pals working here will experience a decrease in SAN value, but they will gain experience points.

MedicalPalBed_02.description: A straw bed for Pals. Pals can rest on it when injured, or to sleep at night. It isn't soft, but it's better than nothing.

MedicalPalBed_03.description: A fluffy bed that Pals can get a good rest on. Pals can rest on it when injured, or to sleep at night. Pals love sleeping on fluffy beds like this.

MedicalPalBed_04.description: A fluffy bed that Pals can get a good rest on. Pals can rest on it when injured, or to sleep at night. Even large Pals can sleep soundly on a bed like this.

MedicalPalBed_05.description: A healing pod for Pals. Used when Pals are injured or to rest at night. Thanks to technological advancements, the healing amount has increased.

MedicineFacility_01.description: A facility for making Pal medicine. It can only produce simple medicines. Leave its operation to a Pal that can make medicine.

MedicineFacility_02.description: A facility for making Pal medicine. It requires electricity, but can produce high quality medicine. Leave its operation to a Pal that can make medicine.

MedicineFacility_03.description: A facility for making medicine to cure Pals' illnesses. With advanced technology, it can also create unknown medicines. Assign the task to a Pal capable of pharmacy work.

Metal_DoorWall.description: Door built on a foundation. Becomes an entrance. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_Gate.description: Gate large enough for big Pals to pass through. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_SlantedRoof.description: Slanted roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_TriangleWall.description: Triangular wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_WindowWall.description: Wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders. Includes a window. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_foundation.description: A foundation for building walls or facilities on. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_roof.description: A roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_stair.description: Stairs placed below a foundation or roof for climbing up. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

Metal_wall.description: Walls built on foundations for keeping out intruders. Made from metal, it is extremely durable.

MiningTool.description: Place in base to improve mining speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Mirror01_Wall_Stone.description: Decorative antique wall mirror. Can be placed on walls.

MonsterFarm.description: Farm for raising sheep and fowl-like Pals. Assign a Pal with the appropriate Partner Skill to a farm to produce items.

MultiElectricHatchingPalEgg.description: Device for incubating Pal eggs. While power supply is required, it allows multiple eggs to be incubated simultaneously at the optimal temperature.

OilPump.description: Equipment required to extract Crude Oil from oil fields. Requires a power supply to operate.

OlympicCauldron.description: Place in base to improve fire-making speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

OperatingTable.description: A facility where surgery can be performed on Pals to change their gender or passive skills.

PalBooth.description: A facility for selling Pals. By setting Pals in the sales list, you can sell them to other players. Assign an Ice Pal to it and the food inside will be less likely to spoil.

PalBoxV2.description: Facility for storing captured Pals. Pals inside gradually recover Health. Area around this facility becomes a base.

PalFoodBox.description: A box for storing Pal food. Pals can feed from it when hungry. Make sure to keep it well-stocked to keep your Pals happy.

PalMedicineBox.description: A shelf for storing medicine. Sick Pals will come here to take their medicine. Be sure to keep the medicine stocked.

Piano01_Stone.description: Decorative grand piano. Cannot be played.

Piano02_Stone.description: Decorative upright piano. Cannot be played.

PlayerBed_02.description: A shoddy bed for humans. Use it when injured or to sleep at night. You won't be able to sleep soundly without a roof over your head.

PlayerBed_03.description: A fluffy bed for humans. Use it when injured or to sleep at night. You won't be able to sleep soundly without a roof over your head.

QuartzPit.description: A facility for producing Pure Quartz. Mining Pure Quartz is hard work that requires physical endurance. Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

Refrigerator.description: Large food vault. Assign an Ice Pal to help prevent food stored inside from spoiling.

RepairBench.description: Workbench for repairing broken tools. Materials are needed to make repairs.

SanityDecrease1.description: A device that generates alpha waves to relax Pals. It slows the rate at which the SAN value of allies at the base decreases. Placing more than two will not have any additional effect.

Seika.description: Decorative Flower Arrangement. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.

Shelf01_Wall_Iron.description: Iron wall shelf for storing items. Can be placed on a wall.

Shelf01_Wall_Stone.description: Antique cabinet for storing items. Can be placed on walls.

Shelf02_Iron.description: Long iron shelf for storing items.

Shelf03_Iron.description: Orange locker for storing items. Decorated with Pal stickers.

Shelf03_Stone.description: Antique chest for storing items. Adorned with a photo of a Pal.

Shelf04_Iron.description: Locker for storing items. Decorated with Pal stickers.

Shelf04_Stone.description: Antique side chest for storing items. Adorned with a photo of a Pal.

Shelf06_Stone.description: Antique long cabinet for storing items. Adorned with a photo of a Pal.

Shelf07_Stone.description: Large antique cabinet for storing items.

Shelf_Cask_Wood.description: Wooden barrel shelf for storing items.

Shelf_Hang01_Wood.description: Wooden shelf for storing items. Can be placed on a wall.

Shelf_Hang02_Wood.description: Decorative wooden shelf. Can be placed on a wall.

Shishiodoshi.description: Decorative Deer Scare. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.

SignExit_Ceiling_Iron.description: Decorative emergency exit sign. Can be placed on ceilings.

SignExit_Wall_Iron.description: Decorative emergency exit sign. Can be placed on walls.

Signboard.description: Can be written on. Use for memos or to communicate with others.

Silo.description: Place in base to improve planting speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

SkinChange.description: Pal Dressing Facility. Give your Pals a new look! Skins obtained inside and outside the game can be applied here!

Snowman.description: Place in base to improve cooling speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Spa.description: Facility where Pals on base can rest. Restores SAN after a long day of hard work.

Spa2.description: Facility where Pals on base can rest. Now comfier and restores more SAN.

Spa3.description: Facility where Pals on base can rest. Restores SAN after a long day of hard work.

SphereFactory_Black_01.description: A Primitive Workbench for producing spheres used for capturing Pals. A small workspace keeps the production speed slow. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

SphereFactory_Black_02.description: An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals. By splitting Pals into groups, production speeds have somewhat increased. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

SphereFactory_Black_03.description: An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals. Through clever management, production speeds have greatly increased. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

SphereFactory_Black_04.description: An Assembly Line for producing spheres used for capturing Pals. Advanced machinery has been introduced, allowing for the production of spheres at high speed. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

StationDeforest2.description: A facility for producing Wood. Cutting wood is hard work that requires much physical endurance. Leave it to Pals skilled in logging.

StonePit.description: A facility for producing Stone. Mining Stone is hard work that requires much physical endurance. Leave it to Pals skilled at mining.

Stone_DoorWall.description: Door built on a foundation. Becomes an entrance. Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_Gate.description: Gate large enough for big Pals to pass through. Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_SlantedRoof.description: Slanted roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind. Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_TriangleWall.description: Triangular wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders. Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_WindowWall.description: Wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders. Includes a window. Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_foundation.description: A foundation for building walls or facilities on. Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_roof.description: A roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind. Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_stair.description: Stairs placed below a foundation or roof for climbing up. Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stone_wall.description: Walls built on foundations for keeping out intruders. Made from stone, it is reasonably sturdy.

Stump.description: Place in base to improve logging speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

SulfurPit.description: Facility for producing Sulfur. Digging Sulfur is grueling physical work. Leave it to a Pal that is good at mining.

TableDresser01_Stone.description: Dresser useful for giving yourself a remake. Allows players to edit their appearance.

Tansu.description: Stores items. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.

Television01_Iron.description: Decorative old TV. Left behind by an ancient civilization. Now it only shows images of Pengullet.

Toilet01_Stone.description: Decorative antique toilet. Cannot be used for its original purpose.

ToolBoxV1.description: Place in base to improve handiwork speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Torch.description: A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

Toro.description: Decorative Stone Lantern. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.

TrafficSign01_Iron.description: Decorative No Pals Beyond sign. Used in ancient times, it now serves no real purpose.

TrafficSign02_Iron.description: Decorative Stop sign. Used in ancient times, it now serves no real purpose.

TrafficSign03_Iron.description: Decorative Beware of Eikthyrdeer sign. In ancient times, collisions between Eikthyrdeer and other Pals were frequent.

TrafficSign04_Iron.description: Decorative Beware of Mammorest sign. In ancient times, those who angered a Mammorest were often killed.

TransmissionTower.description: Place in base to improve electricity generating speed. Placing more than one has no additional effect.

Trap_LegHold.description: Trap that immobilizes Pals who step on it. The capture rate with the sphere increases when a Pal is trapped. Only effective on small Pals.

Trap_LegHold_Big.description: A bear trap to immobilize large Pals. The capture rate with the sphere increases when a Pal is trapped. Only effective on large Pals, small Pals will not be caught.

Trap_MineAttack.description: Trap that explodes when a Pal steps on it. It deals damage to a wide area.

Trap_MineElecShock.description: Trap that electrocutes the Pal that steps on it. The electrocuted Pal has a higher capture rate with the sphere.

Trap_MineFreeze.description: Trap that freezes the Pal that steps on it. The frozen Pal has a higher capture rate with the sphere.

Trap_MovingPanel.description: A description of the moving panel

Trap_Noose.description: Trap that catches Pals passing through it. Pals caught in the trap are easier to catch with Spheres. Only effective on small Pals.

WallSignboard.description: A signboard to write on. Can be hung on walls.

WallTorch.description: A light source that provides illumination to a base even at night. It can be placed on walls. Requires a Fire Pal to light a flame.

WeaponFactory_Dirty_01.description: A Primitive Workbench for producing weapons and ammunition. A small workspace prevents the production of high quality weapons. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

WeaponFactory_Dirty_02.description: An Assembly Line for producing weapons and ammunition. By splitting Pals into groups, production speeds have somewhat increased. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

WeaponFactory_Dirty_03.description: An Assembly Line for producing weapons and ammunition. Through clever management, production speeds have greatly increased. Requires Pals that can work with their hands.

Wood_Gate.description: Gate large enough for big Pals to pass through. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wood_SlantedRoof.description: Slanted roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wood_TriangleWall.description: Triangular wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wood_WindowWall.description: Wall built on a foundation for keeping out intruders. Includes a window. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wooden_DoorWall.description: Door built on a foundation. Becomes an entrance. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wooden_foundation.description: A foundation for building walls or facilities on. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wooden_ladder.description: A ladder that allows you to climb to a slightly higher place.

Wooden_roof.description: A roof built on top of walls to keep out the rain and wind. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wooden_stair.description: Stairs placed below a foundation or roof for climbing up. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

Wooden_wall.description: Walls built on foundations for keeping out intruders. Made from wood, it breaks easily.

WorkBench.description: A Primitive Workbench for producing simple items. Requires a Pal that can work with their hands.

WorkBench_SkillUnlock.description: A Primitive Workbench for producing Pal tools. Make a saddle to ride Pals, or make a gun for Pals to use.

WorkSpeedIncrease1.description: A device that emits beta waves to energize Pals. It increases the work speed of Pals in the base. Placing more than one will not have additional effects.

Zabuton.description: Decorative floor cushion. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.

Zaisu.description: Decorative floor chair. Perfect for Japanese-style buildings.
